# Sign Language Learning Quiz Application

This is a React TypeScript application for learning sign language through interactive quizzes using Supabase as the backend.

## Project Structure
- React 18 with TypeScript
- Supabase for database and authentication
- Video/image support for sign language content
- Quiz functionality with progress tracking
- Modern responsive UI

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all components
- Follow React best practices with hooks
- Implement proper error handling
- Use Supabase for data persistence
- Support media content for sign language demonstrations
